definition: white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera

sentences.english: With industrial-scale whaling, cultural claims ring hollow.
sentences.chinese: 面對工業規模的捕鯨，人文呼籲顯得蒼白無力。

sentences.english: Sometimes the writing language is the most pale and nerveless .
sentences.chinese: 文字語言有時候是最蒼白無力的。

sentences.english: By the side of the pale-faced moon.
sentences.chinese: 展示那蒼白無力的明月。

sentences.english: And it’s probably the weakest excuse ever.
sentences.chinese: 但它卻是最蒼白無力的藉口。
